name: Call Connector
description:
In Call Connector, you play as a phone that controls a telephone network. However, nasty spam calls have started overwhelming the system! 

It is your job to let the good calls (blue) through and to block the spam calls (red.) Wires can be activated or deactivated with the numbers 1-4. Calls come from the north and south, so press Space to flip your character and face the correct direction. The wires you control depend on the direction you are facing. Good luck!

Call Connector is a product of UpTop Studios - https://twitter.com/studios_uptop
